mapper.insert: insert into employee(emp_id, dept_id, position, birthday, name, mobile, internal, email, address, entry_date, password) values (#{emp_id}, #{dept_id}, #{position}, #{birthday}, #{name}, #{mobile}, #{internal}, #{email}, #{address}, #{entry_date} ,#{password})
